sources.title: Roommate Wanted (Full-length biting THRILLER with black humor, new films German complete)

metadata.Plot: Janie is an ambitious student who dreams of a better life. Dee is a gorgeous socialite who dreams of a rich husband. They're already not the best of friends... or the best of roommates. But when Janie gets the opportunity of a lifetime, Dee becomes the roommate from hell as she desperately tries to destroy Janie's life. It's an all out girl-war, leaving a ROOMMATE WANTED.
metadata.Actors: Alexa PenaVega, Spencer Grammer, Kathryn Morris, Richard Riehle
